@graph.name: Optizen App
@graph.description: Advanced optimization and analytics web application with comprehensive changelog tracking and version management capabilities

@graph.name: How to Use Optizen Changelog
@graph.description: Step-by-step guide to navigating and understanding the Optizen changelog

step.name: Access Changelog
step.text: Navigate to the changelog page to view all version updates

step.name: Review Updates
step.text: Browse through chronological list of features, fixes, and improvements

step.name: Track Changes
step.text: Monitor specific updates relevant to your usage patterns

mainEntity.name: How often is the changelog updated?

acceptedAnswer.text: The changelog is updated with each new release and version deployment of the Optizen application.

mainEntity.name: What types of changes are documented?

acceptedAnswer.text: All changes including new features, bug fixes, performance improvements, security updates, and API modifications are documented.

mainEntity.name: Can I subscribe to changelog notifications?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, users can subscribe to receive notifications about important updates and new releases.

@graph.name: Changelog - Optizen App
@graph.description: Complete changelog and version history for Optizen App with detailed release notes and update information

hasDefinedTerm.name: Version Release
hasDefinedTerm.description: A new iteration of the software with updates, fixes, or new features

hasDefinedTerm.name: Bug Fix
hasDefinedTerm.description: Resolution of identified issues or errors in the application

hasDefinedTerm.name: Feature Enhancement
hasDefinedTerm.description: Improvements or additions to existing functionality

hasDefinedTerm.name: Security Update
hasDefinedTerm.description: Changes made to improve application security and data protection

@graph.description: Common scenarios for using the Optizen changelog

itemListElement.name: Version Tracking
itemListElement.description: Monitor application updates and version progression

itemListElement.name: Feature Discovery
itemListElement.description: Learn about new features and capabilities as they are released

itemListElement.name: Issue Resolution
itemListElement.description: Track bug fixes and verify resolution of reported issues

itemListElement.name: Integration Planning
itemListElement.description: Plan system integrations based on API changes and updates

itemListElement.name: Compliance Monitoring
